website_summaries.verdict: This is a daily use product that helps maintain a good looking stove top.
pros: Works on all types of stove tops
Includes a scraper and a scrub pad
Only requires a few drops of product
Looks better over time or if used regularly
Can Bring back the original shine of your stove
cons: The scraper that comes with this product should be used with caution
It can scratch if used incorrectly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing! I hadn't thoroughly scrubbed my glass cooktop in years... Only wiped down with random multi cleaners which never seemed to do much. Then a friend recommended this product... AMAZING! The included scrubbers and scrapers really make the difference. As others have said it will leave your cooktop shiny and new... Even marks that had been on there for years came almost completely off... 98% better. The key is to use very little product... Let dry to a haze and wipe with a clean dry cotton towel. (Just like waxing a car). If you aren't getting a mirrored finish it's because you've used too much product and not enough elbow grease to polish off.
customer_reviews.author: B. Swartwood

customer_reviews.title: Mirror Shine!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. It works as described. It shines the stove like a mirror. I highly recommend it for people with ceramic or glass cooktops. Watch videos on youtube on how to clean a ceramic or glass cooktop. I am also going to share my personal images.
customer_reviews.author: Sara A.

customer_reviews.title: My cooktop looks new again!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a spray at Target made by a different company and although that brand made my cooktop look shiny, you could still see stains. I decided to give this a try and after using the scrapper and the solution my cooktop looked brand new again! I personally haven't been able to find this at my local Target, so I'll continue to purchase it on Amazon, especially since it's so affordable and I know that it works! I wish that this included a couple m ore cleaning pads though, but other than that, this is a great kit to have and it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: denise jones

customer_reviews.title: The blade works great!
customer_reviews.text: We are in a rental house and the stove top seemed to be never ever cleaned. Super gross..... 1. the blade really helps with getting rid off the burnt on stuff. It takes a little effort but it works great! 2. The cleaner solution itself gives the stove top a shine which looks great 3. The yellow scrubby pad ....I can’t tell the difference from the green ones you get at the 99cent store...but the holder is nice. Overall it’s easy to use and gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: acj

customer_reviews.title: Very handy tools come with this kit and I wouldn't use anything else for my glass stovetop
customer_reviews.text: Before I got this kit, I used the Creambrite with just a cloth. I found that when you are anxious to clean your stovetop, you can actually apply the cream and turn the burner on low to medium high and let it dry up. That usually removes tough stains quickly. But just don't leave the burner on. You should remain in your kitchen to be on the safe side. What I like about the tools is opportunity to use a little "elbow grease" tough spots without turning on a burner and buffing the stovetop as the last phase takes less time since the stovetop is cold.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Do not use Razor on Samsung cook top.
customer_reviews.text: Cleaner is average, I have used others that work about the same and this is nothing special to warrant the glowing reviews. If you have a Samsung cook top, do not use the razor as it will scratch your cook top. I used it at the angle recommended, not applying any pressure and just pushing it in a strait line to remove the burnt food, gouged the cook top. I believe its the edges of the razor that dig into the cook top and if you go back and forth and or in circles you will ruin your cook top with deep scratches.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Great on shower doors, not worth it for the stovetop.
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my stove top and I think the scraper was great but the product itself is useless in the stovetop. I prefer hot water and dish soap for the stovetop. I will say it worked well on my glass shower doors. It’s been very useful and I would buy this again just for that. It’s worked better than anything else I’ve tried over the years. All in all, great for shower doors with multiple uses, okay on glass stovetop. If you’re buying this just for the stove to go to the local hardware store and buy your own scraper to get the gunk off. If you’re buying this for other areas then it’s worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: EvE313

customer_reviews.title: It works and you’ll be happy you used it!
customer_reviews.text: Finally got around to using this kit. It’s amazing and well worth the money. I just redesigned my kitchen but decided to keep the old cooktop/oven — for now. It’s older and was here when I bought my house. I used this kit to try to make it look as good as my new kitchen. This stuff worked wonders. Wish I had done a before and after. It’s truly unbelievable. The first step is simply a razor blade to take off any water buildup or deposits, then use the cleaner and scrub pad. I couldn’t believe the difference. My cooktop has some wear and tear on it but I had no idea it could look so good!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Motivate Science

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: This is a glorified glass cleaner. The razor did more than the cleaner. All the cleaner did was make the glass shine. It did nothing to remove the baked on stains.
customer_reviews.author: Riko

customer_reviews.title: Blade half  receded into holder after first use
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I did not use this within the return period and now it's too late. After the first use the blade went into the plastic base by about half and it's much less effective. After next use it went in a little more. There's very little blade left and nothing I can do brings it back. When it worked, it did a decent job though. That cream and scrub pad it came with did not seem to do very much at all.
customer_reviews.author: Myrtle

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner, horrible accessories.
customer_reviews.text: First off I have to say the cleaner itself is great. Works as intended to clean the surface. The rest of this kit is NOT worth it. SUPER cheap sponge pad that basically fell apart while using. Also the razor has no way to lock in place while not using so it can potentially be unsafe while storing. Plus the razor swivels left and right while scraping and pops out of place. Save yourself a little money/hassle and just get the cleaning product by itself and get a better quality razor scraper. Just use a rag to apply the product or a dollar tree sponge. Way better than the crap included with this great cleaning product.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: A Pain Solved
customer_reviews.text: I have a six burner glass cooktop that was a genuine nuisance to keep presentable. Tried every cleaner & pad combo on the market and always ended up using a razor blade scraper from all points of the compass to tidy up the stubborn bits. The leverage that this simple tool provides turned out to be all that was needed to make this a one step process when used with the included compound. A fifteen year aggravation solved. I plan to warehouse multiple of these in case it is ever discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: vsop

customer_reviews.title: Tracking error
customer_reviews.text: It says that this was delivered dirrectly to me...this is not true. All I received was an empty plastic bottle...no cleaner....no scraper...just an empty bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your $$
customer_reviews.text: This product did nothing to get a spot off of my ceramic cook top. I used all three items in the box: starting with the scrubby, then the razor, and finally the polish. Incidentally, there are absolutely no instructions on the box with regards to what order these should be applied. At any rate, none of the items did anything to diminish the spot. Save yourself some money and stop worrying about those spots because they're there to stay 🤨😊
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Best stove top cleaner I've used
customer_reviews.text: I've always been annoyed cleaning our glass stove top, but this has made things so much easier. I even burned on a sauce made with brown suagr last night (and if you've ever done that, you know it's a pain to clean off) and this kit helped clean every little flake off. I've also used the scraper to clean paint off of our countertops and tile floors (I may or may not have spilled some during another diy product 😂) but the scraper helped get it off super easy. 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca B

customer_reviews.title: Polish itself is great
customer_reviews.text: The polish itself is great. I used a paper towel to apply, let dry to a haze and buff off with the other side of the folded paper towel. Beautiful shine. This is my first glass top stove and I despise them, but our local hardware stores had only really cheap small range ones, so I had no choice. The razor blade is ok, very cheap made, but works fine for what its used for. The safety slide on it does not stay, so keep it where small kids can't get to as it doesn't click shut, just pointing it up and the protective part slides back to where the razor is exposed. The other tool and scraper I pitched.
customer_reviews.author: chinook203

customer_reviews.title: Keeps My Stove Top Looking New!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Cerama Bryte for over 10 years on my ceramic stove top and it always rejuvenates the surface to a new-like finish. I've found that cleaning the cook surface with a quality spray like Simple Green to remove superficial gunk followed by a razor scraping initially, works best. Follow up with Cerama Bryte and you will be impressed with the result. I've also found regularly using Cerama Bryte on the cook top makes the next clean up easier; it seals the ceramic and provides lasting protection. The image I've attached is of my 10+ year old range; it still looks new!
customer_reviews.author: Cal Blue

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy cleaning method
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this cleaning kit on glass top stoves for several years, and highly recommend it. The cream removes most marks on the cook top, and the accompanying razor and cleaning pad will remove any residue. If you clean this type of cook top after every use you’ll avoid spending much time cleaning. It literally takes only a minute or two to get the stovetop completely clean and ready for its next use. A few drops will do a thorough job so this size bottle will last a long while.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia P

customer_reviews.title: But the actual cleaner bottle. Do not buy this cleaning "kit".
customer_reviews.text: The actual Cerama Bryte cleaning paste works great! But the scraper that comes in this kit is complete garbage. It's hard to take apart to replace the blade, and when you're trying to use it, it slides closed hiding the blade. This got super frustrating so I ended up discarding the scraper and buying one at the dollar store. The little scrub pad is also a joke. Also you can't get any real leverage with the handle it's so awkward. I'm only giving it 3 be stars because the cleaner itself is effective and leaves my rangetop clean and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Alegab12

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: I had some burnt stains and what looks to be scraped burn marks on my glass top stove. I decided to get this based on the great reviews. I must say, my stove looked noticeably better. It did get all the burnt stains off, but the scrapes are still here, although they aren’t as prominent. I would assume that using this product several times should do the trick. Overall, I am very pleased with the result and would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Comes with the right tools to get the job done
customer_reviews.text: I had been struggling to clean my stovetop for years. Other cleaning products would smell too strong. I’ve also tried the baking soda method with some success but it could get messy. I saw this product on some buzzfeed article and decided to try it based on its great reviews. The scraping blade in the kit is an awesome little tool and so is the sponge holder tool. The formula is easy to clean up and my hands didn’t even have to get dirty. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: PRO

customer_reviews.title: Shiny new stove
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am very satisfied with the results of this product. In the past I have used oven cleaner and it didn't to nearly as good a job as this did. I did have to put some elbow gease into it to get it all off and there are a few spots then didn't come completely clean but in their defense this stove hasn't been properly cleaned in God knows when. I love how shiny my stove looks now and I would definitely recommend this to a friend! I wanted to upload a before and after picture but it doesn't give me that option 😔
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product but read my instructions!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought our electric too would look good again. My husband loves to the the shake and scrape thing with the pots when he cooks. This stuff worked like magic though. I will say we figured out that you need to work different from what the directions say. First spread on the liquid and let sit for a good 25 minutes, then sponge of, then use the scraper after that. The scraper after was what really got those tough spots.
customer_reviews.author: Stef V

customer_reviews.title: Beats the hell out of “natural” solutions
customer_reviews.text: I tried cleaning my stove with all those typical articles using natural solutions (baking soda, ammonia, etc) It was AWFUL. That stuff wouldn’t work. The small amounts it did remove took a ton of work. This stuff is amazing. It instantly cleared up my oven and took way less effort than any other solution I tried. It didn’t smell bad, or seem harsh at all. Highly recommend if you need an oven cleaning savior. This stuff drivers!
customer_reviews.author: Alfred

customer_reviews.title: Scratched Stove Top
customer_reviews.text: This product destroyed my stove stop. I used the razor scraper as instructed at a 30 degree angle and it barely took any dirt and dried on food off. Then I used the cleansing liquid and it left a film on the stove. And finally, after I was done I realized that the razor left scratches all over the stove stop.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Masi

customer_reviews.title: Finally...my stove top is clean!!!
customer_reviews.text: After five years of trying and trying, my stove top is clean! I, too, had a melted microcloth mess on my stove top. I had most of it removed but little bits remained. Not any more. Don't even bother reading the reviews. Just buy this. Use the blade. Get all the little bits remaining. Just use a dime size glob of the cleaner in the middle of your stove top and clean the rest. Then buff with a clean paper towel. It will shine! It's gorgeous!!! You'll love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kak6154

customer_reviews.title: and it worked great. I read the low review comments and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertised ... and it worked great. I read the low review comments and I suggest that folks read the product description before they buy a product (it clearly says what comes with the package) and read and follow the cleaning instructions when you get the product. When you follow the directions, it cleans the stove top up very well. No product will get certain staining out of the stovetop. But this removed all the stains and definitely removed all the caked in dirt. No, it does not look like it is brand new - nothing really does unless it is brand new, but it sure looks very close to new!
customer_reviews.author: David J. Mulholland

customer_reviews.title: The Best product out there for electric stove top cleaner! PERIOD!
customer_reviews.text: Let me say this... THERE is nothing out there that can clean your electric cook top surface better than Cerama Bryte! PERIOD! if you have a electric stove, please do your self a favor and just buy this. (this starter kit is not necessary, as what it gives you is found pretty useless) but the product it self is where the magic is. I use regular paper towel to do the cleaning and no matter how dirty, messy, stained, greased stove top gets, this will make it BRAND NEW every... single.... time!
customer_reviews.author: ItsJustBlah

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY my stove is clean!!!
customer_reviews.text: I hate having an electric stove because it gets dirty soooo easily. Fortunately this product makes it easy to clean, with the razor and shine product. You definitely need to be careful with the razor as you might scratch the top (personally I’m super careful as I’m waiting to buy a new stove soon and I have yet to scratch mine but can see that happening) but it does make it so much easier to get off those stubborn burnt on parts. Finally can cook on my stove top workout it always smoking from old stubborn stuck on grease. Not to mention, it looks all shiny and new every time I clean it. M
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Magical stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This product made wonders in my cooktop! As a rental, I have to use the stove that was already in the house, and while it wasn’t nasty, it definitely had some burnt spots on it. This thing took care of all of that in just a couple minutes! All those burnt stuff that were there for God knows how long came out in a single use of this product! I’m so glad I got this.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Ribeiro

customer_reviews.title: It worked for me.
customer_reviews.text: I am new to ceramic top ranges and not the most careful cook. I googled how to clean these things and tried the razor blade. That worked a bit. Bought two other cleaners that were more like just waxes. Then bought this kit. First try it took off about 75% of the crud. Used it again a week later and that took off about 95%. This does leave a semi-waxy coat that makes bacon grease and such easier to clean but not like the other cleaners I tried that left a thick coat that looked worse than before. And yeah, the cleaner pad is a bit primitive but it does work quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Artist in the Hood

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I tried EVERYTHING for two years to get the ring of baked-on grime off of our stovetop. Nothing worked. I figured I’d give this product a go since the kit was just $10. IT’S AMAZING. A little scrape with the razor and a few scrubs with the cleaner and pad. BOOM! Nasty rings around the burners are GONE!
customer_reviews.author: OperaDiva

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic! It removed gunk that was stuck on the cooktop from the previous renter. It left my stovetop so nice and shiny it almost looks brand new. I was very impressed I told my aunt about it since she was complaining one day to me about her glass top. Well, she called me like a week later to tell me she bought and tried it and it worked awesome for her too. I definitely recommend this cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: You need this. I swear.
customer_reviews.text: First off, this is magic. I often cook & get side tracked. Hence the mess in the first picture. I knew I needed something to help me clean my cooktop because nothing I had was working. I stumbled across this on Amazon and figured it couldn't hurt to try. I’m SO glad I did. It took me multiple rounds of scraping & cleaning to get it to where you see in the before and after pictures but it WORKS. It’s sooooo easy to use. I will buy this forever!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly. Looks like new.
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of cooked on food and it kept getting worse. Soap and water do not work. I bought this Cerama Bryte kit and it took me less than 10 minutes to get the stove top looking new again. VERY happy with the results. My process - use blade to scrape off hardened food, put on cleanser, then use pad all over stove top, then wipe with damp cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon SuperReviewr

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: I got this cleaner because of some of the before and after pictures and also my bestie uses this cleaner. I was super happy with the results. Do keep in mind that this product does require a good bit of elbow grease for those tougher stuck on stains. Also the scaper was my favorite part. It gave me that immediate gratification to see the progress of my hard work. Also the waxing part was therapeutic. If you are looking for a quick minimal work or effort product, this ain't it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie D.

customer_reviews.title: Stuff really works
customer_reviews.text: WOW does this Cerama Bryte stuff really work. We used the stuff that came with our range and it did OK. but left a residue and so did another we bought. I saw the reviews on this one and they are not wrong. It was simple, easy to apply and work in. Buffed right off and made the cooktop look even better than new. Now ours was not a deep ground in mess but did have some sticky stuff around a few burners. The scrapper took care of that easy as heck. The reviews are right. This is a 5-star product for sure.
customer_reviews.author: James T.

customer_reviews.title: Use the scraper!
customer_reviews.text: Giving this four stars, but I must admit I thought it would dissolve the cooked on gunk on the glass top better. The best thing about it is the razor scraper! Guess you could get a razor scraper and then use a glass cleaner to shine it. I literally spent two hours scraping vigorously. But, four stars for the after shine. Hoping it will prove to be a good maintenance cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use the scraper include with this unless you want a scratch on your range.
customer_reviews.text: Does seem to work at all. The scraper included actual put the first scratch on my range.
customer_reviews.author: Narea7

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly!
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally set a plastic cutting board on my glass stovetop when it was still warm and melted some. I looked online for suggestions after baking soda and vinegar did nothing. Several people recommended this kit and the scrubber worked amazingly. The cleanser itself is like other cleansers, bit that scrubbing tool is they key. Wish I took some pictures to show you because it truly looks perfect now!
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I should have taken a before.. this worked GREAT! My stove top looks amazing. It isn’t perfect because I was nervous to scrape too hard but it did such a great job! This is after 3 years of everyday cooking. My stovetop has never looked that great! My husband even noticed it. I’m sure after round 2 all the residue will be gone.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Smith

customer_reviews.title: 15 min to remove 5 year-old stains!
customer_reviews.text: I only wish I had taken before pictures! I can honestly say, I wasn’t expecting this product works so well! TJ easy to use instructions made it quick work to scrape off the old hard water deposits and what I thought were baked on permanently food stains. Honestly, the stove top looks better than when we first bought the house! I couldn’t be happier! Usually, I would say give him five stars is a bit much, but in this case it is absolutely warranted!
customer_reviews.author: X. IrAal

customer_reviews.title: Works Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but this ACTUALLY works! My stove top was so clean and shiny afterwards! I don't usually do many reviews, but this one deserves it. You won't regret purchasing this product. The ONLY thing that could be an issue is using the scrubbing pad because it's a little awkward and if you get anything on it you have to toss it because it holds onto everything.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff G

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, underwhelmed!
customer_reviews.text: Got fooled by buzzfeed. The “tools” are unnecessary and made of cheap plastic, the scraper is a flat edge razor blade, scrubbers- generic, and the cleaner is nothing more than citric acid with humectant! I can buy straight citric acid (sold as rinse aid for the dishwasher) and higher quality scrubbers at the dollar store!
customer_reviews.author: Napaloo

customer_reviews.title: Serious elbow grease required but it works
customer_reviews.text: My glass cook top refused to be clean no matter what I scrubbed it with. It's like the burnt in liquids had fused into the glass and become one. I ordered this after hearing about it somewhere and I'm so glad I did. It actually works. You have to scrub hard with the brush it comes with. Serious elbow grease is required. But it works and it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, terrible scraper
customer_reviews.text: So. I’ve been using this for about 6 weeks. The razor blade is terrible because when you push it onto the glass top, the blade likes to pop back inside. So it takes a lot to brute force. I found steel wool to be helpful, too. Otherwise, this product works great and after probably 3 cleans, my glass top finally looks nearly brand new. The razor blade scraper needs to be designed better, though.
customer_reviews.author: Emily S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: The instruction manual that came with our new Samsung range recommended this product, and we found that it works really well! Just a dime-sized drop cleans and protects the entire glass surface and reduces fingerprints. We used the provided scraper to remove some cooked on food, and it did so without scratching the glass.
customer_reviews.author: G. K. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: I've seen reviews of this where people are scratching their ceramic stove tops with the included razor, but to me that only means they're not being gentle or using a really light angle to scrape burnt food off. So far, I've successfully scraped off burnt-on milk, eggs, and God-only-knows what else off my stove and the cleaning compound brings it all to a nice shine with no streaks. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S.

customer_reviews.title: Works well with some elbow grease.
customer_reviews.text: This cleaning set has worked quite well on the "tough stuff" that I end up burning onto our glass top stove. When I went looking for a cleaner for the stove, I looked through all of the reviews and found that most of these seemed to be consistently positive. So, after trying this on my own mess, I found that once you added in a bit of elbow grease, this really did the job. However, it is important to know that it did take some work, but I completely expected that when buying this so that was not a problem for myself. Overall, it came well packaged, quickly and worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler Klotz

customer_reviews.title: Best Stove Cleaner Hands Down!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love LOVE this stuff! Who else hates cleaning their stove like me?? It feels like everytime I clean the stove it just gets dirty again. Well I found THE BEST clean for your stove top. I applied this once after having oil and food caked onto my stove and within seconds of using the cloth to clean it off it was TOTALLY clean. Seriously this stuff is incredible. It also comes with a little scraper which is perfect for getting those little nuggets of food off your stove. Buy this stuff..you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith B

customer_reviews.title: Best Product For Stove Top
customer_reviews.text: My stove top is now the cleanest it has ever been (except when it was new). Between the scraper, cleaning agent, and the pad overall it does an excellent job at cleaning my stove top. Out of all the products I have used in the past it does the best job. Pros: Clean and Shiny Stove Top Easy to Use Pad handle allows to scrub really hard without a lot of force from your hand Cons: There were a few small spots not successful at getting rid of
customer_reviews.author: NRA

customer_reviews.title: I thought my cooktop was hopeless
customer_reviews.text: We bought our cooktop 5 months ago and it started developing really bad marks and stains. I tried everything to get it off, including baking soda, different detergents, etc. Really thought it was hopeless. We even tried to return our cooktop but because we couldn't we decided to give it one last try. Using the two tool that come with this cleaner we got 100% of the impossible stains off. I could not recommend this product more!!
customer_reviews.author: luckyrabbit

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical if this would work on an enamel stovetop, but it works fabulous. I have a GE gas range that has a dark charcoal top. Although I am pretty meticulous about keeping it clean, after 4 years it had (key word here) some buildup around the bottom of the burners and the round pieces that sit on top of the burner, (beneath the grate) had some dark spots on them. I used the enclosed pad and scrubber handle and with just a very small drop of cleaner, it dissolved all the gunk away! Stove is like brand new again. I have tried a number of cleaners and this is by far and away the best.
customer_reviews.author: cvg

customer_reviews.title: Shiny & Clean
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product. The scraper that comes with it is extremely handy and help gets the dried food off stove and the sponge is good as well. The cleaning gel is easy to apply and cleans my stove and leaves it shiny clean. You do not need alot of gel to clean stove. I definently recommend it. Only con, I could think of would be I wish there was an extra cleaning sponge. But that's super minor.
customer_reviews.author: Megottya Reviews

customer_reviews.title: THIS STUFF WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a new glass top stove and want to keep it looking new. (Fat chance of that being a Southern Girl. Bring on the deep-fry!) Before that 'new range smell' was off the burners, I had burnt on food to deal with. My new range came with a sample size bottle of CERAMA BRYTE and scrubber. It took very little product to completely clean the range top like new! Just clean and buff it out with a micro fiber cloth. Had to buy a larger size. Love the new scrubbers, too. THIS STUFF WORKS.
customer_reviews.author: Lab Rat

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use one-step product, perfect for induction cooktops
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product by far est product for cleaning an induction cooktop, just squeeze it on and use a microfiber towel (which are available in big packs here on Amazon) to polish the induction glass. The black scraper is handy for tough stains and honestly in a year of using this product I've never had to use the blue razor blade. Just re-purchased this in the larger 2-pack 28 oz size because it's fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Da Moogs

customer_reviews.title: Go to Cooktop Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years with my cooktops. Its safe and effective as long as you follow the directions and allow it to dry completely before using the scrapper or the cleaning pad. Depending on how bad the cooked on food is, you will need a little elbow grease. We recently started buying this from Amazon instead of the local stores and saved a little money. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: 4Boys&Wife

customer_reviews.title: Scratched my glass top stove!!
customer_reviews.text: Scratched my glass top stove. The cleaner works very well, I felt like I was getting it truly clean for the first time ever. But the scrubber left shallow little scratches alllll over. And the razor blade works on the worst of the baked ok who-knows-what, but after putting in a lot of elbow grease and several attempts, there's still some baked on stuff, and now I have to debate about whether to keep at it or live with it rather than add to the scratches. And see if the baking powder paste I have found recommended on the internet actually works for buffing out light scratches. A cleaner shouldn't make me more work!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela L

customer_reviews.title: Worked amazingly well!
customer_reviews.text: When the product arrived today I decided to give it a try on my 10 year old ceramic cooktop. I never hold out much luck for a ‘miracle product’, but I was pleasantly surprised. The cooktop was not too dirty, but did have some marks & scratches I thought would not come out easily. Not only did it clean them with about 5 minutes of elbow grease, but it did truly make the cook top look brand new. To be honest, I thought my cooktop was pretty clean since we wipe it down after every use, but this product made it look new.
customer_reviews.author: BobbeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I was having a hard time find a glass top cleaner in the store. Found this one on Amazon. The scraper really help the process of cleaning. The cleaning cloth could be a little larger but it still worked. The cleaner cleaned well without scratching the glass or leaving any residue.
customer_reviews.author: Oddfact

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!!
customer_reviews.text: Holy Star Spangled Banner!! This product is abso-freakin-lutely amazing!! This stove is less than two months old and I thought I ruined it by letting stuff burn onto the stove top. I used Mrs. Meyers, 409, Easy-Off...you name it, I tried it, and nothing worked! I even dragged a pot across the burner, leaving a nice scratch. I decided to give Cerama Bryte a try - just $10 - what’s the worst that can happen? It is like magic! No scratches, no burnt residue, just brand spanking new! It took no time at all and was super easy to use! Even check out the time stamps in the picture! In 11 minutes, you too can have a new stove again!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Our ceramic top has seen better days as I cook a lot. I typically use just a magic eraser and baking soda but wanted to try something else. Well my method worked just the same if not better. The first pic is the before, second is after using the cerama bright, third is me finishing the job with magic eraser and baking soda.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great product that really works
customer_reviews.text: We have tried everything and finally this Cerama Bryte Cooking top cleaner really works. We are very pleased with this product. We thought we might need to buy a new cook top until we saw this product and the reviews were so high. I thought we would just try it. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Cricket

customer_reviews.title: This actually works but it’s a big job!
customer_reviews.text: When I bought my house, I think my seller left me with 2 years of caked on grease to clean. This product bundle includes a scraper and scouring pad- both of which you’ll need. The key is to scrape like your life depends on it, pour some solution on and scour with the same vigor, then wipe clean. Repeat A LOT. You should probably get amped up on caffeine before you do this. It’s a big job. Pics to show you my progress so you know it works.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Hess

customer_reviews.title: Cerama Bryte really works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to deal with waterspots and haze on my brand new Samsung glass top stove. Cerama Bryte was the perfect answer. I have tried several home remedies and been so disappointed. This product is great and gives my stove the look and feel that it had on its first day.
customer_reviews.author: PamC

customer_reviews.title: This product is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I hate cleaning my glass stove top! I Purchased this product because of the positive reviews, plus this item comes with the razor scrapper. This item really works & I agree with all the past positive reviews. It’s a must purchase if you have a glass stove top.
customer_reviews.author: Mary in MN

customer_reviews.title: Cook top looks new
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at how well this cleaned my cooktop. I was expecting it to kind of just get the burnt stuff off but after I used it, my cooktop is like new. It's so shiny and I got *most* of the burnt stuff off. But the parts that it would not take off were there before we moved in 2 years ago, so I'm not surprised. All in all, a great product and so easy to use. No harsh smells either.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Balsitis

customer_reviews.title: Arrived missing parts, ineligible for return
customer_reviews.text: Arrived missing the pow-r grip cleaning tool and was ineligible for return, frustrating to not get everything I paid for. Scraper and cleaner work well. Just missing parts
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Hartwig

customer_reviews.title: Worth every nickel a ten star product
customer_reviews.text: This product performed absolutely amazing. I recently moved into a new apartment with a stove top that looked to have 5 years baked onto the surface. I followed the instructions and add a bit more solutions than recommend with extra elbow grease. Just like magic it restored the cooktop ’almost’ back to its original state. I highly recommend this product with this type of cook top!
customer_reviews.author: Just A Guy in NJ

customer_reviews.title: Pad Scratches, But Cleans Well
customer_reviews.text: Beware: the yellow pad that comes with this kit will put tiny micro scratches (the size of a strand of fine hair) in the surface of your ceramic glass cooktop. If that doesn’t concern you or your cooktop is already several years old and marked up a bit then this is an excellent cleaning kit. The razor scraper removes cooked on gunk with a bit of elbow grease and the cleaning liquid and yellow pad get rid of the rest. It’s the cleanest my stovetop has looked in ages.
customer_reviews.author: PNWcatlady

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had before/after
customer_reviews.text: My BF's old white glass top stove was DISGUSTING. I tried elbow grease and every cleaning product known to man with little effect. This stuff actually worked! I can't say it looks like new because it was pretty old to begin with, but it looks CLEAN and I did not think that was possible.
customer_reviews.author: Patty O

customer_reviews.title: Miracle solution
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I used this stuff I couldn't believe it! We had a new stove that I didn't clean for months and assumed the burned pea juice (my enemy) would just be a new stain forever. However, after one application it was basically gone. I used the scraper that came with it and did one more small application on just that spot and it was gone! Every time I use this it looks like my stove could be brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Works well, even if it’s not a miracle cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I had great hopes after reading the reviews on this item. It works well, but it is definitely not the miracle worker some reviewers have claimed it to be. Other products seems to work just as well and my glass stove top still looks a bit dingy.
customer_reviews.author: EEM14

customer_reviews.title: Works well with a little effort, but razor scraper should be safely discarded.
customer_reviews.text: This brand was recommended by the appliance sales rep. It works pretty well although a certain amount of effort is required. The included razor scraper is not great as the blade guard can open up just by putting the scraper down. This is a dangerous tool. Tape it closed and throw it away. A better choice would be a metal-cased razor scraper available at any hardware or paint store.
customer_reviews.author: BillH

customer_reviews.title: If only you could just buy the scrapper.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I got a before and after picture of my stove top! I had so much burnt on water marks that I couldn’t get off with any stove cleaning products. The real magic of this is the razor blade scrapper. It’s inside a blue handle and has a open and shut part on it so that the blade isn’t always exposed. You can even take it apart and put a new razor blade in when it gets to worn down.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Scott

customer_reviews.title: It comes with everything you need!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessive about my stove being clean. I just ran out of the cleaner that came with my stove, so I decided to give this a try. I hadn’t cleaned my stove in two weeks because of running out of cleaner, and this cleaner took off the crud without hardly any elbow grease! I am a customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great Stove Cleaning Package
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me you hate cleaning those flat topped stoves as they can be pretty brutal to clean easily and efficiently. This "kit" had everything in place and made quick work of cleaning the stovetop. The cleaner worked well and was easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: cecile t. robes

customer_reviews.title: On further review this is an excellent glass top cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Initially I gave this product an average review and stated Cook Top brand was better, but after a month of use, I must say this is an excellent glass top cleaner. It’s formula is less of a paste wax and more of a liquid cleaner leaving no waxing residue to contend with. It’s excellent at removing stains and we will be a repeat customer for sure.
customer_reviews.author: O Banger

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t do any magic
customer_reviews.text: Only the scraper was helpful to scrap off burns. I don’t think the liquid cleaner did much to be honest and the cleaning pad is something you can buy from store a lot cheaper and it comes as a packet of cleaning pads.
customer_reviews.author: Safa

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, works great!
customer_reviews.text: My stovetop hasn’t looked this clean and shiny in so long! I allowed the Cerama Bryte to sit for about 20 mins while cleaning something else, then scrubbed it away with that great little sponge. I did have to use some elbow grease to get the tougher stains off, and will have to reapply another time, but the difference is incredible. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha L.

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky Clean
customer_reviews.text: This product works like magic, with the help of the blade. Pour a drop of cleaner on the glass cooktop, scrub, then use the blade to gently peel away burnt residue. It will not scratch your cooktop if you hold it right. There is a faint smell but it is not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M.

customer_reviews.title: ONE OF THE BEST PRODUCTS EVER
customer_reviews.text: I have a new cooktop, so shiny, but the "glass" does show everything. I use initially a special cooktop cleaner for glass which is good for ordinary spots etc. But for the occasional tough spot, like starchy substances baked on, I use the Cerama Bryte product. It is applied in more of a thick liquid using a clean rag. It took very little effort to remove the stain that the ordinary Miracle cleaner failed to clean. Rarely, do I give 5 stars but I was impressed.
customer_reviews.author: mareebr

customer_reviews.title: Use the pad tool!
customer_reviews.text: First time I tried it with just a paper towel and was disappointed. Then I tried with the pad tool and wow does it work! You don't need to scrub that hard and like magic the cooktop is clean. Just rinse the yellow pad and all the burnt black stuff and grease falls right off.
customer_reviews.author: Buckeyegam3r

customer_reviews.title: Saved my heavily abused stovetop 👍 Amazing result!
customer_reviews.text: Please look at the before & after pictures! They pretty much explain themselves. Although it took some time and strength to clean, I’m happy about the results.
customer_reviews.author: ❀ Simba & Maria ❀Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Takes some effort but does work !
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised the nicely packaged razor blade worked well at removed stubborn and aged stains on a glass cooktop. It does take some effort and patience to remove the stains slowly but product does work. I used the cleaner first, then the razor blade, then used the cleaner again
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging for this product arrived taped together. Still, it looked new. I tried regular all purpose cleaners and a magic eraser on my stove top prior to trying this product. Nothing worked. I like that this is multi-step. The razor gets off a lot of the burnt on gunk, and then the cleaner and scrubbing pad take off the rest. It was incredible. I gave 4-stars because it didn't get entirely clean. However, it looks SIGNIFICANTLY better. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Was not able to remove my burnt food stain.
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the review and what I read about it. I have an electric stove that has a burnt food that formed a ring around the heat. The cleaner did not help remove the burnt food. The razor helped removed it but kept on sliding back in; made it hard for me to scrub. There is no chemical smell so I can clean while my toddler was around.
customer_reviews.author: Nou Q.

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece and doesn't work great.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with the package opened and without the scrubbing handle. Contacted Amazon and was given a refund. Still tried to use the product and it didn't really do much at all. It made everything more shiney...but It didn't remove any of the stubborn stains. Even the scraper wasn't getting any of it up. The scrubber and paper towel were dirty, so it did get some nasty up. That's the reason for the two stars. It didn't remove any of the tough stuff though. Overall, I'm dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: Some food spilled on my stove top while I was cooking (which I'm sure happened to most of us) and nothing I did would get the burnt food off of my stove. Once the cleaner arrived I opened the package, read the instructions, scrapped the food away and used a small amount of the cleaner and it worked! It didn't streak or leave residue. It worked so well that my stove looked as if I never used it. I still use it when I want to make the stove shine like new. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lysa

customer_reviews.title: Love the tools that come with it.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh!! 10 stars if I could. The kit was amazing. The razor blade tool took off some disgusting stuff that’s been on since before we bought our house a year ago. Then the polish and tool did wonders. I like the tools that came with it because I didn’t have to get my hands dirty. My husband commented that he could see his reflection in the stove now.
customer_reviews.author: NicoleS

customer_reviews.title: It really worked!
customer_reviews.text: This cleaning kit really did work. Maybe it's the razor blade tool, which you use to scrape off the burnt-on food. Previously I've used cooktop cleaner, no scratch sponges, baking soda, vinegar, you name it. Nothing worked until I tried this. In one application it cleaned all that burnt stuff on the burners that I thought was stuck on there forever. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Herbal gal

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product, wish I could give it more stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, wish I could give it more stars. My cooktop looks better today, than it did when I purchased the stove one year ago. Very easy to use, and cleans easily, and leaves a brilliant shine behind., I had burned on rings on both big burners, this did the job with very little effort on my part. Will most definitely purchase again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Carmon

customer_reviews.title: Great for baked on spots
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product. My husband and I are on the keto diet. Every single night its steak cooked on my stove top at 500 degrees with tons of butter and oil. I've tried every to clean off the burnt on and baked on stuff with no success. I got this and it lifted all the grime without discoloration of my stove. It was easy to wipe off with a damp towel and left my kitchen smelling great.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler A.

customer_reviews.title: Glass top stove cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This has worked great on our glass top stove. These new glass top stoves are very touchy and hard to keep clean. Our son has a glass top also and we ordered some for them and they are thrilled with the results! So far we are very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Bottle directions
customer_reviews.text: I have used Cerama Bryte Cooktop Cleaner for very many years. Of which this is the best cleaner to use. It cleans and shines the stovetop like new. I would recommend this cleaner to anyone with a flat top stove cleaner - the best.
customer_reviews.author: Mom June

customer_reviews.title: Does What It Is Suppose To Do
customer_reviews.text: My glass top stove is about 3 years old and in very good condition because I "baby" it. Lately, many recipes have caused me to use by black cast iron skillet more (rue for gumbo) and I am VERY CAREFUL not to drag or scratch stove. I noticed a little "whitening" though and this product really cleans, brightens the stove. I REALLY LIKE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I have an electric stove top and set a bread bag on top of a burner by accident. The plastic melted pretty bad and wouldn't come up with soap and water. I used some of this and it came up within a few minutes and some elbow grease.
customer_reviews.author: Truman

customer_reviews.title: Good for stubborn & old stains
customer_reviews.text: Had some old, dried stains on my cooktop. Had tried other products before. This worked well. Has a scrubber with handle so you don’t have to touch the product or scrubber pad. The razor blade scraper worked very well on the hardest stuck stains. Much easier to use. Glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Susy Shelton

customer_reviews.title: It Works on  tough old grease
customer_reviews.text: Love this product , works great , I moved to a house the oven was new but the stovetop had very old residue Which I tried to clean with different products and natural remedies , but it didn’t work But when I saw this product on YouTube, I bought it it worked right away. PS you need the scraper that comes with it . Don’t get just the Solution .
customer_reviews.author: The rock

customer_reviews.title: Works great. It is also good on many surfaces
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer!. Had the hardest time finding something to clean my stove without scratching the surface. This thing works wonders. You can use with the yellow sponge that comes with it or just use paper towels. Works great. It is also good on many surfaces, not just stovetop. I recommended it to my family and they all loved it!
customer_reviews.author: BaiSam

Our innovative Clear-View Cooktop Cleaning Kit allows consumers to see the full value of our most popular set of cooktop cleaning products.
